meta.title: Doce vida - Gisele Stein
meta.description: Descubra 10 receitas doces ricas em proteínas para diversificar seus cafés da manhã, lanches ou refeições pós-treino - apoiando seus objetivos de perda de peso ou ganho muscular

hero.title: Sweet Life
hero.subtitle: Indulge in Healthy Protein-Packed Treats
hero.description: Discover 10 delicious protein-rich sweet recipes to diversify your breakfasts, snacks or post-workout meals — supporting your weight loss or muscle-building goals

benefits.title: What are the benefits of consuming these sweets?
benefits.benefit-1: Enjoy healthier, sweet moments with your family
benefits.benefit-3: Lose weight or gain lean mass
benefits.benefit-4: To prevent diseases such as Obesity, Diabetes, and Sarcopenia
benefits.benefit-5: Vary the sources of protein in your day

gallery.title: What are the recipes in the E-book?
gallery.sweet-recipes: With the Sweet Life E-book, you will learn 10 protein-rich sweet recipes, consisting of 5 cold and 5 hot recipes.
gallery.cold-recipes: Cold recipes: Fruit Smoothie, Fruit Yogurt, Overnight Oats, Frozen treat, and Chocolate Cup Delight.
gallery.hot-recipes: Hot recipes: Pancake, Brownie, Mug Cake, Oatmeal Porridge, and Hot Chocolate.
gallery.swiper-title: Check out the photos of the recipes
